column1: Little Goat Diner////I am biased because I "heart" Top Chef! This place is fantastic
column2: the Mac n'cheese is delicious. My sister strangely ordered the baked beans
column4: a breaded pork cutlet on white bread (hmm) with Asian BBQ
column5: mayo and cabbage slaw. For me
column6: if something is breaded it doesn't need bread
column8: I really liked whatever it was marinated in and wish I had had more of that and less mayo/white bread. As for dessert
column9: I tried the smoked pork and toffee milkshake. It was good
column10: I didn't get much pork beyond a salty aftertaste but I like a toffee milk milkshake anytime.
